title: VTU signs pact with UK firm to introduce Artificial Super Intelligence
description: Bengaluru, Feb 6 (PTI) VTU on Friday said it has signed an agreement with UK-based company Chiac ASI to introduce Artificial Super Intelligence, a technology considered to surpass conventional AI. title: Bernie, DeSantis Are Both Right on Data Centers: Mary Ellen Klas
description: Bernie Sanders and Ron DeSantis don’t agree on much, but the data-center boom is a rare exception. Vermont’s Democratic Socialist senator and Florida’s right-wing governor want to slam the brakes on the hundreds of resource-intensive new facilities springing up across the country to power the artificial intelligence industry. And both point to profits, not the public good, as the real factor motivating the boom.
